name: AVAssetReaderAudioMixOutput
desc: An object that reads audio samples that result from mixing audio from one or more tracks.

items.name: init(audioTracks: [AVAssetTrack], audioSettings: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Creates an object that reads mixed audio from the specified audio tracks.

items.name: var audioMix: AVAudioMix?
items.desc: The audio mix to use with this output.

items.name: var audioTimePitchAlgorithm: AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm
items.desc: The processing algorithm to use for scaled audio edits.

items.name: var audioTracks: [AVAssetTrack]
items.desc: The tracks from which the output reads audio.

items.name: var audioSettings: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The audio settings that the output uses.
